Sentencas: To improve the performance of the cathode, many groups have studied the relationship between the cathode microstructure and the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition

Sentencas: In this study, a porous La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 +/- (delta)(LSM) cathode film with primary particles of under 10 nm diameters was prepared by aerosol flame deposition (AFD).
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition

Sentencas: The AFD technique was applied to synthesize the spherical particles and dense LSM thin film.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition

Sentencas: The cathode performance was improved, and the polarization resistance was decreased by extending the active triple phase boundary.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition

Sentencas: The electrochemical characteristics were investigated in the temperature range of 600-900 degrees C and oxygen partial pressure range of 0.1-1.0 atm.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition

Sentencas: For oxygen reduction reaction on the LSM cathode, it was turned out that both oxygen atom diffusion and oxygen ion transfer from the three phase boundary to the yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte lattice were the rate-determining steps with comparable contributions.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of the prepared LSM film decreased from 206 to 1.7 Omega cm(2) with increasing temperature from about 600 to 900 degrees C and the activation energy was 1.48 eV. (c) 2013 Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition
Preparation of nano-crystalline strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) powder and porous film by aerosol flame deposition
